DOC.brief_summary: This study show efficacy safety low dose diltiazem treatment atrial fibrillation rapid ventricular response emergency room . We compare standard dose diltiazem ( 0.25mg/kg ) low dose diltiazem ( 0.1mg/kg ) atrial fibrillation rapid ventricular response ED .
DOC.brief_title: Low Dose Diltiazem Rate Control Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: atrial fibrillation rapid ventricular response emergency room age < 18 systolic blood pressure < 90mmHg consent
